36/**
37 * \file
38 *
39 * This file contains a data type and functions to help estimate good
40 * round trip times for UDP resend timeout values.
41 */
42
43#ifndef UTIL_RTT_H
44#define UTIL_RTT_H
45
46/**
47 * RTT information. Keeps packet Round Trip Time.
48 */
49struct rtt_info {
50 /** smoothed rtt estimator, in milliseconds */
51 int srtt;
52 /** smoothed mean deviation, in milliseconds */
53 int rttvar;
54 /** current RTO in use, in milliseconds */
55 int rto;
56};
57
58/** min retransmit timeout value, in milliseconds */
59extern int RTT_MIN_TIMEOUT;
60/** max retransmit timeout value, in milliseconds */
61#define RTT_MAX_TIMEOUT 120000
62
63/**
64 * Initialize RTT estimators.
65 * @param rtt: The structure. Caller is responsible for allocation of it.
66 */
67void rtt_init(struct rtt_info* rtt);
68
69/**
70 * Get timeout to use for sending a UDP packet.
71 * @param rtt: round trip statistics structure.
72 * @return: timeout to use in milliseconds. Relative time value.
73 */
74int rtt_timeout(const struct rtt_info* rtt);
75
76/**
77 * Get unclamped timeout to use for server selection.
78 * Recent timeouts are reflected in the returned value.
79 * @param rtt: round trip statistics structure.
80 * @return: value to use in milliseconds.
81 */
82int rtt_unclamped(const struct rtt_info* rtt);
83
84/**
85 * RTT for valid responses. Without timeouts.
86 * @param rtt: round trip statistics structure.
87 * @return: value in msec.
88 */
89int rtt_notimeout(const struct rtt_info* rtt);
90
91/**
92 * Update the statistics with a new roundtrip estimate observation.
93 * @param rtt: round trip statistics structure.
94 * @param ms: estimate of roundtrip time in milliseconds.
95 */
96void rtt_update(struct rtt_info* rtt, int ms);
97
98/**
99 * Update the statistics with a new timeout expired observation.
100 * @param rtt: round trip statistics structure.
101 * @param orig: original rtt time given for the query that timed out.
102 * Used to calculate the maximum responsible backed off time that
103 * can reasonably be applied.
104 */
105void rtt_lost(struct rtt_info* rtt, int orig);
106
107#endif /* UTIL_RTT_H */
108
